property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 2

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After Slade fails a Hex pull, pull again and use that value instead. Ace the Hex after applying its effects (if any).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: One or more of your Deputies in any location(s) joins your posse at a Government deed (moving if necessary).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Wylie has +1 bullet for each wanted dude in the opposing posse.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Swap Gang Yi with one of your dudes in a posse that is opposing a wanted dude (Gang Yi joins the posse; the other dude moves to Gang Yi's location and is no longer in the posse).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your wanted dudes accepts a call-out, Alice may join the posse from any location (without booting, and even while booted).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: When a dude is aced, pull. If the pull is higher than the dude's value, discard them instead.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 2

property.name: Text
property.value: When Lillian enters a posse, place 3 ghost rock on her. The ghost rock may be used to pay for Shootout abilities (it is not a bounty). Discard her unused ghost rock after the shootout. Shootout, Pay X Ghost Rock: X of your dudes in any location(s) join Lillian's posse (moving if necessary).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Move your wanted dude to another location (without booting).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: A 2-stud Gunslinger token enters play and joins your posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot a wanted dude. Noon:Boot a card worth one of more control points.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot your dude to reduce another dude's bullet rating by your dude's bullet rating. If their bullet rating is now 0 boot them.

property.name: Text
property.value: All dudes not controlled by this deed's controller have -1 influence while unbooted at home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Boot your dude without a control point at this location. Raise their bounty by 2. They permanently get 1 control point.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget-Difficulty 4

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are the Winner, this dude cannot be affected by other players' Shootout abilities. Repeat Noon, 1GR: Look at a player’s hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget-Difficulty 8

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock, Boot this Dude: Choose a deed at an adjacent location. Its owner must pay ghost rock equal to its production. If they cannot or do not, discard the deed (any dudes there go home booted).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex X, Boot: X is the grit of a dude at this location. Take control of the dude until after the Sundown phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Reduce a wanted dude's bounty to 0. Discard this card. Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: Raise the bounty on a dude by 2. Ace this card.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Noon: Reduce a wanted dude's bounty to 0. Discard this card.||Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: Raise the bounty on a dude by 2. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex X, Boot: X is the value of a dude at this or an adjacent location. Boot the dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: One of your dudes calls out an opposing dude at their location. All dudes in both posses use their influence rather than their bullet rating for the shootout (but keep their bullet type). Your dude becomes a stud for this shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Search your deck and/or discard pile for a Horse. Attach it to one of your unbooted dudes (paying all costs).

property.name: Instructions
property.value: onPlay[Search your deck|-|Search your discard pile]

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Lower a player's draw hand by 1 rank. Cheatin' Resolution: Lower a player's draw hand by 4 ranks.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: onPlay[Resolution: Lower a player’s draw hand by 1 rank.|-|Cheatin’ Resolution: Lower a player’s draw hand by 4 ranks.]

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Private-Ranch-Out of Town-Experimental

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Gain 2 ghost rock and pull. If the pull is a club, discard this deed and all cards at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Play a deed (as shoppin'), reducing its cost by 2 ghost rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the influence of a dude at this or an adjacent location by 1.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Controller Noon: Boot this deed to raise the influence of a dude at this or an adjacent location by 1||Controller Noon: Boot this deed to lower the influence of a dude at this or an adjacent location by 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Jake has +2 Influence during the Sundown phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you reveal a legal draw hand, Mario cannot be chosen as a casualty unless you lose this shootout round by 3 or more ranks.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: When aced to cover casualties in a shootout, reduce the remaining casualties you must cover by 2.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Make a Huckster skill check against the value of a dude at this or an adjacent location. If successful, boot that dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 0

property.name: Text
property.value: If Mortimer is in your posse when you reveal an illegal draw hand, send him home booted and reduce his influence to 0 until after Sundown. If you have no other dudes in your posse, the shootout immediately ends.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Swap this dude with any of your dudes in a Shootout where the other player's posse has one or more dudes with a bounty.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Angéca joins a posse at an adjacent location without moving or booting.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 0

property.name: Text
property.value: While in a shootout, Joséains a bonus to his Huckster skill equal to his bullet rating.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 2

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: If Kyle is at a Ranch, unboot the Ranch. Its abiliies may be used an additional time this turn.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Boot, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: Gain ghost rock equal to the production of a deed you control, but do not own.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget-Difficulty 3

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude gets an influence bonus equal to the number of influence counters on this card. Discard all influence counters on this card at the end of the Upkeep phase. Repeat Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: Add an influence counter to this card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mystical-Weapon-Gadget-Difficulty 5

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Choose an opposing dude. That dude gets -1 bullets. If that dude is an Abomination, they must be chosen as the first casualty (if possible).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon/Shootout, Boot: Give a target dude -3 Value (to a minimum of 1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Hex 4, Boot: One opposing dude gets -1 bullets and -2 value. If that dude is aced or discarded during this shootout, this Huckster permanently gains 1 control point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex 5: Choose an ability printed on a Dude at this or an adjacent location. The Dude cannot use the ability until after Sundown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot your Horse to send a dude without a Horse at this location home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After your call-out is accepted, the mark must form their posse before you form yours. The mark has -2 bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Mark the town square. Each other player may unboot a dude in town. If successful, each other player must ace one of their dudes in town.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller React, Boot: After you win lowball, choose your dude to get +3 influence until after the first High Noon play (including passing) is resolved

property.name: Text
property.value: This deed is considered adjacent to all out of town deeds. Controller Noon, Boot: Move your dude from this location to an adjacent location.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Non-Unique-Gadget-Difficulty 5

property.name: Text
property.value: Quaterman must be invented by a Mad Scientist like any other gadget. It enters play at the Mad Scientist's location (but does not attach). Quaterman's bullets cannot be modified except by attached goods. Cards cannot move or boot Quaterman.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: If Angela is at a deed you do not own, gain 2 ghost rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: At the start of the game, discard a card from your play hand to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: If Richard is out of town, pull. If the pull is red, search your discard pile or Boot Hill for a Mystical goods and add it to your hand.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 4

property.name: Text
property.value: Tom can only move to your home or to a location that has another Fourth Ring dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time an opposing player reveals an illegal draw hand and you do not, you may draw a card then discard a card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time a player reveals an illegal draw hand and you do not, Drew may immediately attempt to invent a Gadget without booting (other requirements of inventing must still be met).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Allie leads a job that marks an opposing dude. If successful, the mark's controller must give you ghost rock equal to the mark's influence. If the player cannot or does not, discard the mark.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever Milt's bounty increases, gain 1 ghost rock.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After Arvid enters play, make a tradin' Noon play.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Boot: Arden makes a mad scientist skill check against an opposing dude's grit. If successful, send that dude home booted. If successful by 6 or more, ace the dude. If the pull is a spade or a joker, Arden suffers the same fate.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experimental-Improvement-Gadget-Difficulty 6

property.name: Text
property.value: After this gadget is invented, attach it to a deed that you control. Repeat Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: Choose your dude at this location and pull. If the pull is a club, discard the dude. Otherwise, move your dude to another location (without booting).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Choose a goods in the opposing posse and pull. If the pull is lower than the value of the goods, discard the goods.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude has Huckster: 0. If this card leaves this dude, discard all Hexes from this dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution Hex 5, Boot: You may place a card from your draw hand into your play hand after resolution. If this is a shootout, you suffer 3 less casualties this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex 5: If successful, mark the town square for a job. If the job succeeds, immediately play an Abomination from your hand reducing its cost by 6 ghost rock (paying all other costs). The Abomination permanently gains 1 control point.
